job_description:
AffinityClick builds the apps that keep you connected. Whether it’s voice calls, messaging, or data, AffinityClick has modern telephony and data solutions that help consumers and businesses stay in touch.

Our flagship product, “Hushed”, is one of the largest VOIP apps, with millions of installs and over 500,000 monthly active users for both IOS and Android devices. Hushed provides easy-to-use, affordable, private voice and text communications worldwide.

aloSIM, our latest product, provides affordable data connectivity services on any eSIM-compatible device, with coverage provided by more than 100+ carrier networks globally.

AffinityClick has been profitable since 2013; our offices are located in the heart of Canada's capital city, Ottawa. Whether you want to come into the office or work remotely, AffinityClick has the best work environment for you.

We foster a strong learning environment through active discussion, code reviews, and mentorship. Check out our products here https://www.affinityclick.com/, and we look forward to having you join our fast-growing team!

About this role
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to work on the AffinityClick server-side platform. As a Software Engineer, you’ll be instrumental in implementing new features and maintaining our current production environment.

You have
An understanding of design patterns and clean code
6+ years of back-end experience using Node.js, JavaScript, JSON, REST, and MongoDB
Working experience with Go
Experience with GIT
Experience working in a Scrum Team
Experience with production server management
Experience designing software architectures
Experience mentoring junior developers

Nice to have
Experience with the SIP stack
Jira
GRPC
Knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker
Experience with microservice architectures

About you
Passionate about data privacy and communication security
Self-motivated team player with great communication skills
Problem solver with the ability to quickly learn and apply new methods and technology
A strong belief in development best practices
Strong communication skills
A high standard for code and application quality

What we offer
We offer competitive pay, a training budget, fully stacked health insurance, access to our products, paid holiday, cool team vibes, and much more.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Casual dress

Paid time off

Remote work
